description: After everyone blows their loads in Scene 2 Spencer Reed makes a power-play by locking the other guys in a cage so he can play with puppy Shane all by himself. He chains the pup and parades him in front of the captive pack when suddenly Shane pisses all over the floor. Spencer punishes him by shoving his fat cock up Shane's ass. Shane gets the key to the cage and frees the sex-crazed leathermen who surround him and take turns plowing his ass. All of the hardcore butt/face-fucking leaves Shane spent and worn out.
title: Pack Attack 5: Shane Frost, Scene #03
